data.author: payneardo

changelog.release_notes: My first attempt at designing a watchface.  This has digital time, date, connectivity, battery and weather.  And of course the mighty mariners badge with Blundell Park as a background.  I will try and update this as my skills grow :)  UTM !!

data.description: This is my first attempt at creating a watch face and I have hopefully come up with one that is must for all Mariner fans.  This Grimsby Town FC watchface has all you need to view on your wrist with connectivity, date, time (of course), weather (via location and updates every 60 minutes) and battery.  It also has the magical Blundell Park and the Grimsby Town FC badge as a background :).  As my skills grow I will try and update this but I hope you enjoy my first effort, UTM !!! :)

latest_release.release_notes: My first attempt at designing a watchface.  This has digital time, date, connectivity, battery and weather.  And of course the mighty mariners badge with Blundell Park as a background.  I will try and update this as my skills grow :)  UTM !!

data.title: Grimsby Town FC - Date and Weather
